### Hi there üëã 

- üî≠ I'm passionate about **science, technology, and creativity**.
- üå± Currently working a lot with **AI, Flet apps, and Python projects**.
- üí° I love **building things with AI** ‚Äî from chatbots to creative tools.  
- üà∂ I'm learning **Japanese** with the help of AI.  
- üèîÔ∏è I enjoy **hiking and exploring mountains**.  
- üéå Big fan of **anime and Japanese culture**.  
- ‚ö° I love to **travel around the world** and discover new ideas.
